name: iith.github.io
body:
### Welcome to OpenSource@iith.
This page will host many, if not all, projects on which folks@IITH work.

```
$ git clone http://github.com/iith/repo_name
$ cd repo_name
$ git commit -m "My first contribution to opensource@IITH"
$ git push origin master
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
